welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Foleshill, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. Get ready to explore and experience all that Foleshill has to offer, we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and leisure flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
